divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving back to London from Tonbridge wells in Kent England with a friend and my 2 kids We was driving along the A21 Sevenoaks bypass, traveling towards the M25 and London It was 1055pm on the 21St of June 2008, when I noticed out of my left eye a fleet of ufos they were like a constellation of red to orange to white and back to orange colour orbs, they were just above the horizon of the fields trees that were silueted to my left side around a hundred feet up and around 3 hundred feet away, I said to Sam my mate sitting on my left next to me, look at that, there, He said that's a constellation, I said no way it's too close to the ground and look at the colour of the other stars, there white these are orangey red and white, so he laughs at me for being too quick to call it ufos. Well we hadn't got a min up the road when again on the left side of the road in the next field along, we all saw hundreds of them, again this time they were not only on the ground and all spread out over this field they were hanging there just above the ground from left of the field to right, about 2 hundred feet across this field, and what I noticed most was that they were like getting into line and making a pillar of spiralling lights going up around maybe 3 to 4 hundred feet into the air, but keeping this shape of a tube or strait line of lights Like something was slowly vacuuming them up a glass tube but not so fast, just like a floating motion Well Sam said john don't stop on the road if a car comes up from behind they might hit you so I keep going don't stop, Well the road didn't have any hard shoulder to stop on and I had a few cars behind me now, but I did slow down to around 20 miles an hour and the cars behind me slowed also, there must have been around 5 or 6 cars behind me but no one seemed to mind that I had slowed my cars speed down ,no one gave me a toot on their horn, they all must have seen it too, it was like Christmas lights out there, they were lighting up the hole field in this orangey red colour I continued watching them in my rear mirror , I asked if everyone is ok and my little girl in the backseat said im scared so we just kept driving I wanted to stop i did have a phonecamera but didnt take any pics as i couldnt stop on the road I did see this and thay were not thai lanterns
